CustomField.description:
Total count of quotes won in the past 30 days . This count is performed and mapped by the 360 custom setting.
Source field = C360_Won_Last_30_Days__c
Criteria for won quotes is stage changed to won - today <=30.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Count of quotes won in the last 30 days for related accounts
CustomField.label: Quotes Won Last 30 Days
